snippet: The tech reporters and editors at Bits are combing through Facebook's long-awaited filing for an initial public offering, seeking interesting details and highlights.
abstract: The tech reporters and editors at Bits are combing through Facebook's long-awaited filing for an initial public offering, seeking interesting details and highlights.
lead_paragraph: The tech reporters and editors at Bits are combing through Facebook's long-awaited filing for an initial public offering, seeking interesting details and highlights. They are regularly updating their Bits post and linking to the best analyses. Read more »
